thread.title: John and Julie
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by John and Julie

author: John and Julie
title: John and Julie
text:
Jeff made planning our vacation very easy.
He gave us many options to chose from, he focused on what was important to us and even worked it out to fit into our budget!
I feel very confident that this will be a fantastic vacation.
Jeff was extremely knowledgeable about multiple destinations and hotels.
